r.d:
This is a quick and efficient BBCode Parsing Library. It provides various tag types, high speed tree based parsing, callback system, tag position restriction, Smiley Handling, Subparsing
It will force closing BBCode tags in the good order, and closing terminating tags at the end of the string this is in order to ensure HTML Validity in all case.
r.n: * Corrected 64bit issues, long were used on too many places (#14517) thanks tony for the doc * Corrected a segfault when quotes were not closed properly. * Corrected errors given by scripts/dev/check_parameters.php. * Added quote escaping (BBCODE_ARG_QUOTE_ESCAPING). * Changed behaviour when a tag as an unclosed quoted argument. Before 1.0.2 it would stop treating datas, now the parser continues just after the opening quote character. * Added an escaping test case
